alfredsnippet.snippet:
Lance Endersbee, A Voyage of Discovery, p.107

"The question of the physical basis of the force of gravity is quite profound, and continues to be studiously avoided by most of the physicists and astronomers. We are all aware of the consequences of the force of gravity, but the cause of the force of gravity remains a mystery."
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - The Question of the Physical Basis of Gravity is Studiously Avoided By Most Physicists and Astronomers
